Public Member Functions

(id) - initWithSize:factory:
(void) - filterWithInputArray:outputArray:timestamp:

Detailed Description

This class is used to filter an array of doubles, typically an ARQuaternion or ARPoint3D.

Member Function Documentation

Parameters:
